plot: Nolan takes his son's fiancée, Abigail, on a ride-along after she shows interest in becoming a police officer. Meanwhile, Jackson's relationship is becoming complicated at work.

Tim grudgingly allows Lucy to switch partner to a female while recovering from her abduction trauma, under training officer Nyla Harper. That leaves Tim free to act as babysitter for Nolan's son Henry's fiancee Abigail, who the Nolans wanted to experience the grim side of police work and -training in the vain hope she would be scared off. Lover Sterling Freeman's Hollywood fame having compromised Jackson's police work due to storming fans, they fake a very public breakup.—KGF Vissers
